title: tomsanta222
author: tomsanta222
content: I remember back in the day when Andreas Antonopoulos explained the "killer app" for the crypto industry as the DAO, and basically coined the term. This was I suppose in 2013 or 2014.It was right before the "DAO debacle" on Ethereum, around the time when the EVM was being discussed theoretically.The concept is making a comeback this year with a growing set of building platforms becoming available.So, a few questions for the public:-Do you think that a DAO will have a real world use case soon? if so, which one(s)?-Is DAO the new ICO?-Is DeFi always a DAO?-Threat of a centralized DAO?-Can a commit or code execution be forced through a DAO?
